### Example on mtcars data set

```{r}
# for info about data set use ?mtcars

mtcars$vs

#  (1)
table(mtcars$vs)   

```

Use tally() for obtain **(1)** and make plot

```{r}
require(ggplot2)
require(dplyr)

data <- mtcars %>% 
           group_by(vs) %>% tally()

data
                          

ggplot(data,aes(factor(vs),n),color="red") + geom_bar(stat="identity",fill = "#FF6666") + xlab("")

```
